Dear Mr. Lavandero:
7
\y
I am enclosing the Fact Shaets you requested in your letter of August 22.
You will note thatmost of them We staple punctures in the upper left-
hand comer. I am sorry we could not send you ones that had net been
stapled, but we are almost out of Series 1, and in order to fill you order,
we had to break a complete set.
I am sorry for the delay in answering your letter, and I hope the enclosed
Fact Sheets suit your needs.
Sincerely,
(Mrs.) Judith B. Gans
Secretary
